医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能工具通过活检图像预测癌细胞中的基因活性为了确定癌症的类型和严重程度，病理学家通常在显微镜下分析肿瘤活检的薄片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/AI-powered-tool-predicts-gene-activity-in-cancer-cells-from-biopsy-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/AI-powered-tool-predicts-gene-activity-in-cancer-cells-from-biopsy-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b648a06f-a2e2-4c79-bce9-81ce50ae8489 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 23:01:46 -0500 AI-powered tool predicts gene activity in cancer cells from biopsy images
研究人员利用脑脊液解开阿尔茨海默病的通路许多基因与阿尔茨海默病的发展有关。具体来说，这些基因如何影响神经退行性疾病的进展仍然是一个黑匣子，部分原因是在分子细节上检查活体患者大脑的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Researchers-use-cerebrospinal-fluid-to-unlock-pathways-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Researchers-use-cerebrospinal-fluid-to-unlock-pathways-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b00650f0-2684-4893-9984-5b38ec5defc2 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:57:50 -0500 Researchers use cerebrospinal fluid to unlock pathways in Alzheimer's disease
女性消防员因接触有毒物质而面临较高的乳腺癌风险有充分证据表明，消防员的癌症发病率明显高于普通人群，而这些升高的发病率与工作中接触有毒化学物质有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Female-firefighters-face-elevated-breast-cancer-risks-due-to-有毒-exposures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Female-firefighters-face-elevated-breast-cancer-risks-due-to-有毒-exposures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=092ce2c0-7e36-4c8b-a724-562feb803d83 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:34:28 -0500 Female firefighters face elevated breast cancer risks due to toxic exposures
未来人工智能驱动的虚拟实验室设计出有效的 SARS-CoV-2 纳米抗体人工智能与人类在“虚拟实验室”中的合作成功设计并通过实验验证了与 SARS-CoV-2 变体结合增强的纳米抗体，为跨学科研究提供了一种新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Futuristic-AI-powered-virtual-lab-designs-potted-SARS-CoV-2-nanobodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Futuristic-AI-powered-virtual-lab-designs-pot-SARS-CoV-2-nanobodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25258806-eff5-48eb-b8db-b6b0f1003b6b Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:34:00 -0500 Futuristic AI-powered virtual lab designs potent SARS-CoV-2 nanobodies
替泽帕肽显着降低肥胖和糖尿病前期患者的体重和糖尿病风险替泽帕肽在肥胖和糖尿病前期患者中显示出减肥和预防糖尿病进展的前景，具有持久的益处和可控制的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Tirzepatide-significantly-reduces-weight-and-diabetes-risk-in-病人-with-obesity-and-prediabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Tirzepatide-significantly-reduces-weight-and-diabetes-risk-in-病人-with-obesity-and-prediabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50ce60a2-03b4-46fc-a1b6-13afa54e7b4e Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:07:00 -0500 Tirzepatide significantly reduces weight and diabetes risk in patients with obesity and prediabetes
新的生物传感器技术可能彻底改变MPOX诊断自 2023 年以来，一种新的人类 MPOX 变种已夺去了刚果民主共和国报告感染者约 5% 的生命，其中许多是儿童。从那时起，它已经传播到其他几个国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/New-biosensor-technology-could-revolutionize-mpox-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/New-biosensor-technology-could-revolutionize-mpox-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d79afd66-7b5b-4d8c-a156-809cc8a3d0ad Thu, 14 Nov 2024 22:05:46 -0500 New biosensor technology could revolutionize mpox diagnosis
StitchR 技术为肌营养不良症治疗提供大基因基因疗法可以有效治疗各种疾病，但对于肌肉萎缩症等一些使人衰弱的疾病来说，存在一个大问题：体型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/StitchR-technology-delivers-large-genes-for-muscular-dystropy-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/StitchR-technology-delivers-large-genes-for-muscular-dystropy-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e07d860a-043e-4830-b6bb-5c9d838649c4 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 21:54:00 -0500 StitchR technology delivers large genes for muscular dystrophy treatment
产前接触大麻与日后阿片类药物成瘾风险增加有关随着休闲大麻的合法化程度不断提高，美国有多达五分之一的孕妇正在使用这种药物来缓解孕吐、腰痛或焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Prenatal-cannabis-exposure-linked-to-increased-risk-of-opioid-addiction-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Prenatal-cannabis-exposure-linked-to-increased-risk-of-opioid-addiction-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5de4276-cf6e-43b6-ae7b-88eb7f61628c Thu, 14 Nov 2024 21:48:39 -0500 Prenatal cannabis exposure linked to increased risk of opioid addiction later in life
新药物策略逆转胰腺癌免疫治疗耐药性约翰霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心和俄勒冈健康与科学大学的研究人员进行的一项研究表明，一种调节肿瘤免疫微环境的新药物策略可能会将抵抗免疫治疗的肿瘤转变为易感肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/New-drug-strategy-reverses-resistance-to-immunotherapy-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/New-drug-strategy-reverses-resistance-to-immunotherapy-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=220cfc80-8bd5-4c1d-9ad4-26ea1f208f19 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 21:38:45 -0500 New drug strategy reverses resistance to immunotherapy in pancreatic cancer
3 期研究发现 inebilizumab 对免疫球蛋白 G4 相关疾病有效由麻省总医院布里格姆分校的研究人员领导的一项国际三期临床试验可以改善一种可能导致衰弱症状的罕见疾病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Phase-3-study-finds-inebilizumab- effective-for-immunoglobulin-G4e28093lated-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Phase-3-study-finds-inebilizumab- effective-for-immunoglobulin-G4e28093lated-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=537ab120-b75e-42aa-b1a2-553935332a63 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 21:33:30 -0500 Phase 3 study finds inebilizumab effective for immunoglobulin G4–related disease
